message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit, while offering you a good value. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,300,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,250,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
